Package ie.mtu.application.student.model

Interface Observer

All Known Implementing Classes:
AddStudentGUI, CrashView, RecordModuleGUI, ViewRecordGUI
public interface Observer
The interface Observer will need to be implemented by the classes from the View package The classes from the Model package will call this method when it will be necessary to update the View GUI

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void displayMessage​(java.lang.String errorMessage, java.lang.String colorHexa)
    Method that will be call when we want to pop up a message in the View
    void updateView​(University university)
    The method will be called by the model when it will be necessary to make some change in the view that will implement this class

  • Method Details

    • updateView

      void updateView​(University university)
      The method will be called by the model when it will be necessary to make some change in the view that will implement this class
      Parameters:
      university - : the main class of the Model package

    • displayMessage

      void displayMessage​(java.lang.String errorMessage, java.lang.String colorHexa)
      Method that will be call when we want to pop up a message in the View
      Parameters:
      errorMessage - : The message that we want to write
      colorHexa - : The hexadecimal color we want the message to be
